channel.title: Whirlwind Wheelchair
channel.description: A non-profit social enterprise dedicated to improving the lives of people with disabilities in the developing world while also promoting sustainable local economic development

item.title: I Haven’t Tipped Once in the 10 Years
item.dc:creator: Israel Curtis
item.description: Whirlwind’s co-founder, Ralf Hotchkiss was interviewed in December by San Francisco’s KGO radio. Check out the audio clip and find out why he hasn’t tipped forward out of his RoughRider’s® in ten years! Transcription for this video: I Haven’t Tipped Once in the 10 Years
item.content:encoded:
Whirlwind’s co-founder, Ralf Hotchkiss was interviewed in December by San Francisco’s KGO radio.
Check out the audio clip and find out why he hasn’t tipped forward out of his RoughRider’s® in ten years!

Transcription for this video: I Haven’t Tipped Once in the 10 Years
